plot: Detective Suk investigates the murders of his superior, two former StB members, and the Commissioner, who were all poisoned.

Grimmer, who is investigating 511 Kinderheim, has passed out after being tortured by members of the former Czechoslovakian secret police. When he comes to, he is surrounded by their dead bodies. One of the bodies is that of Zeman, a Prague police inspector. And Detective Jan Suk, Zeman's protege begins to investigate this case.—Anonymous
